canvas:CanvasModel.name: Business Model Canvas TO-BE
canvas:CanvasModel.documentation:
The Business Model Canvas is a strategic management and entrepreneurial tool. It allows you to describe, design, challenge, invent, and pivot your business model.
For more information visit http://www.businessmodelgeneration.com
This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 3.0 Unported License. To view a copy of this license, visit http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/
canvas:CanvasModel.hintContent:
The Business Model Canvas is a strategic management and entrepreneurial tool. It allows you to describe, design, challenge, invent, and pivot your business model.

For more information visit http://www.businessmodelgeneration.com

This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 3.0 Unported License. To view a copy of this license, visit http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/

children.hintContent:
• Who are our Key Partners?
  • Who are our Key Suppliers?
  • Which Key Resources are we acquiring from partners?
  • Which Key Activities do partners perform?

    • Motivations for partnerships:
  • Optimization and economy
  • Reduction of risk and uncertainty
  • Acquisition of particular resources and activities

children.content: Fabricantes e distribuidores de peças originais e paralelas. Gateways de pagamento e fintechs. Transportadoras e operadores logísticos. Parceiros de tecnologia (hospedagem, segurança, IA e CRM). Plataformas de e-commerce e marketing digital.

children.hintContent:
• What Key Activities do our Value Propositions require?
  • Our Distribution Channels?
  • Customer Relationships?
  • Revenue Streams?

    • Categories:

  • Production
  • Problem Solving
  • Platform/Network
    •

children.content: Integração logística e controle de estoque. Gestão do e-commerce e catálogo digital. Atendimento e suporte online. Marketing digital e otimização de SEO. Desenvolvimento tecnológico e experiência do usuário (UX/UI). Negociação com fornecedores e atualização de preços.

children.hintContent:
• What Key Resources do our Value Propositions require?
  • Our Distribution Channels?
  • Customer Relationships?
  • Revenue Streams?

    • Types of resources:

  • Physical
  • Intellectual (brand patents, copyrights, data)
  • Human
  • Financial

children.content: Plataforma de e-commerce e app mobile. Base de dados de produtos e clientes Infraestrutura tecnológica segura e escalável. Equipe de marketing, tecnologia e atendimento. Parcerias com fornecedores e operadores logísticos.

children.hintContent:
• What value do we deliver to the customer?
  • Which one of our customer’s problems are we helping to solve?
  • What bundles of products and services are we offering to each Customer Segment?
  • Which customer needs are we satisfying?

    • Characteristics:

  • Newness
  • Performance
  • Customization
  • “Getting the Job Done”
  • Design
  • Brand/Status
  • Price
  • Cost Reduction
  • Risk Reduction
  • Accessibility
  • Convenience/Usability

children.content: Oferecer peças de alta qualidade com ampla disponibilidade, em uma plataforma digital intuitiva e segura, que proporcione uma experiência de compra ágil, prática e personalizada unindo conveniência, confiança e atendimento humanizado

children.hintContent:
• What type of relationship does each of our Customer
  • Segments expect us to establish and maintain with them?
  • Which ones have we established?
  • How are they integrated with the rest of our business model?
  • How costly are they?

    • Examples:

  • Personal assistance
  • Dedicated Personal Assistance
  • Self-Service
  • Automated Services
  • Communities
  • Co-creation

children.content: Suporte via chat online e WhatsApp. Atendimento personalizado e acompanhamento pós-venda. Programas de fidelidade, pontos e cashback. Autoatendimento e acompanhamento de pedidos em tempo real. E-mails e notificações com recomendações personalizadas.

children.hintContent:
• Through which Channels do our Customer Segments want to be reached?
  • How are we reaching them now?
  • How are our Channels integrated?
  • Which ones work best?
  • Which ones are most cost-efficient?
  • How are we integrating them with customer routines?

    • Channel phases:

    1. Awareness.
    How do we raise awareness about our company’s products and services?

    2. Evaluation.
    How do we help customers evaluate our organization’s Value Proposition?

    3. Purchase.
    How do we allow customers to purchase specific products and services?

    4. Delivery.
    How do we deliver a Value Proposition to customers?

    5. After sales.
    How do we provide post-purchase customer support?

• For whom are we creating value?
  • Who are our most important customers?

  • Mass Market
  • Niche Market
  • Segmented
  • Diversified
  • Multi-sided Platform

children.content: Consumidor final (motoristas, mecânicos e entusiastas automotivos). Oficinas e revendas independentes. Empresas de frotas e transportadoras. Parceiros B2B e marketplaces.

children.hintContent:
• What are the most important costs inherent in our business model?
  • Which Key Resources are most expensive?
  • Which Key Activities are most expensive?

    Is your business more:
  • Cost Driven (leanest cost structure, low price value proposition, maximum automation, extensive outsourcing)
  • Value Driven ( focused on value creation, premium value proposition)
    •

    Sample Characteristics:
  • Fixed Costs (salaries, rents, utilities)
  • Variable costs
  • Economies of scale
  • Economies of scope

children.content: Custos com tecnologia (servidores, hospedagem, manutenção). Logística e frete. Taxas de pagamento online e comissões de marketplace. Custos administrativos e operacionais. Marketing digital (mídia paga, SEO, influenciadores). Equipe de atendimento e suporte.

children.name: Block
children.hintContent:
• For what value are our customers really willing to pay?
  • For what do they currently pay?
  • How are they currently paying?
  • How would they prefer to pay?
  • How much does each Revenue Stream contribute to overall revenues?

    • Types:

  • Asset sale
  • Usage fee
  • Subscription Fees
  • Lending/Renting/Leasing
  • Licensing
  • Brokerage fees
  • Advertising
    •

    Fixed Pricing:

  • List Price
  • Product feature dependent
  • Customer segment dependent
  • Volume dependent
    •

    Dynamic Pricing:

  • Negotiation( bargaining)
  • Yield Management
  • Real-time-Market
    •

children.content: Taxas de frete e serviços adicionais. Comissões de parceiros e afiliados. Vendas diretas pelo e-commerce. Publicidade e destaque de produtos na plataforma. Assinatura mensal

The Business Model Canvas: http://www.businessmodelgeneration.com This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 3.0 Unported License. To view a copy of this license, visit http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/
